newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar ends flat at 485.75/486.75/dlr.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar ends flat at 485.75/486.75/dlr.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar closed flat at 485.75/486.76 per dollar in moderate trade as the Central Bank supplied the market with its dollar needs, traders said.
"The Central Bank sold enough to meet the day's demand for dollars ... but not so much as to firm the exchange rate," said one trader.

Venezuela's foreign exchange market is unusual in that the Central Bank is its largest single supplier of dollars, which blurs the difference between the Central Bank supplying liquidity and intervening.
